TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SimplePropertyEntry extends System.Web.UI.PropertyEntry

Docs.summary: Represents the definition of the control property and its value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SimplePropertyEntry class represents simple properties or those properties that are not collections. The <xref:System.Web.UI.ComplexPropertyEntry> class represents complex types such as collections.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the formatted string representation of the property entry.
Docs.value: A pertaining to the property entry.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor.SetAttribute%2A> method should be called for the property during code creation.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value of the property entry.
